ARGUMENT
d

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | evpmss.s | |- S = ( SymGrp ` D ) |
| 2 |  | evpmss.p | |- P = ( Base ` S ) |
| 3 |  | psgnevpmb.n | |- N = ( pmSgn ` D ) |
| 4 |  | #P_elex | |- ( D e. Fin -> D e. _V ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( d = D -> ( pmSgn ` d ) = ( pmSgn ` D ) ) |
| 6 | 5, 3 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( d = D -> ( pmSgn ` d ) = N ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_cnveqd | |- ( d = D -> `' ( pmSgn ` d ) = `' N ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_imaeq1d | |- ( d = D -> ( `' ( pmSgn ` d ) " { 1 } ) = ( `' N " { 1 } ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_df-evpm | |- pmEven = ( d e. _V |-> ( `' ( pmSgn ` d ) " { 1 } ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( pmSgn ` D ) e. _V |
| 11 | 3, 10 | #P_eqeltri | |- N e. _V |
| 12 | 11 | #P_cnvex | |- `' N e. _V |
| 13 |  | #P_imaexg | |- ( `' N e. _V -> ( `' N " { 1 } ) e. _V ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( `' N " { 1 } ) e. _V |
| 15 | 8, 9, 14 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( D e. _V -> ( pmEven ` D ) = ( `' N " { 1 } ) ) |
| 16 | 4, 15 | #P_syl | |- ( D e. Fin -> ( pmEven ` D ) = ( `' N " { 1 } ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( D e. Fin -> ( F e. ( pmEven ` D ) <-> F e. ( `' N " { 1 } ) ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) |`s { 1 , -u 1 } ) = ( ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) |`s { 1 , -u 1 } ) |
| 19 | 1, 3, 18 | #P_psgnghm2 | |- ( D e. Fin -> N e. ( S GrpHom ( ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) |`s { 1 , -u 1 } ) ) ) |
| 20 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) |`s { 1 , -u 1 } ) ) = ( Base ` ( ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) |`s { 1 , -u 1 } ) ) |
| 21 | 2, 20 | #P_ghmf | |- ( N e. ( S GrpHom ( ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) |`s { 1 , -u 1 } ) ) -> N : P --> ( Base ` ( ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) |`s { 1 , -u 1 } ) ) ) |
| 22 | 19, 21 | #P_syl | |- ( D e. Fin -> N : P --> ( Base ` ( ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) |`s { 1 , -u 1 } ) ) ) |
| 23 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( N : P --> ( Base ` ( ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) |`s { 1 , -u 1 } ) ) -> N Fn P ) |
| 24 |  | #P_fniniseg | |- ( N Fn P -> ( F e. ( `' N " { 1 } ) <-> ( F e. P /\ ( N ` F ) = 1 ) ) ) |
| 25 | 22, 23, 24 | #P_3syl | |- ( D e. Fin -> ( F e. ( `' N " { 1 } ) <-> ( F e. P /\ ( N ` F ) = 1 ) ) ) |
| 26 | 17, 25 | #P_bitrd | |- ( D e. Fin -> ( F e. ( pmEven ` D ) <-> ( F e. P /\ ( N ` F ) = 1 ) ) ) |
